name: ninjutsu-chesu
description:
You are the black traveler. Reach the top row alive!

A small gamejam game Made solo in ~8 hours by Moritz for Berlin Mini Jam.  The themes were: Only 2  Colors,  Pure Chaos, and Totally Unrealistic Sports Game.

Click on a legal square when it's your turn. Don't die, and reach the top row.

Press 1, 2 or 3 to choose level. 

Music and Soundeffects from Zapsplat!
